title: 有关于MonsterApocalypse插件的设置问题
author: hr19980926
txt_content: rt这个插件我装载在k锅服务器上配置也写好了但是不知道为什么服务器没办法对我修改的配置对怪物进行调整所以希望研究过的大佬能帮我解答下这个问题

replies.author: hr19980926
replies.txt_content:
这里是编写的配置
Worlds:
- world
Automatically over-write relevant parts of config to zombie apocalypse for next run?: false
Always night: false
Nightmare mode multiplier: 1.0
Nightmare mode period: 1200000
Nightmare mode exponential?: true
Use new event system?: true
Check for the deaggro permission for entity attacks, shooting super arrows, and mega-aggro?: true
Enable natural hostile spawns?: true
Enable natural passive spawns?: true
Enable spawn points?: false
Allow this MA installation to register the spawnpoint command?: true
Enable bonus spawns?: true
Enable naturalistic bonus spawns?: true
Hard cap on all mobs spawning: 1000000
Main server spawn X (used for calculating wilderness spawn scaling): 0
Main server spawn Z (used for calculating wilderness spawn scaling): 0
Only enable bonus spawns on one world?: true
'Bonus spawn world name:': world
Only enable naturalistic bonus spawns on one selected world?: false
Naturalistic bonus spawn world name: world
Spawn individual wave mobs in the same spot?: false
Enable bonus spawns midair? (Useful for Ghasts): false
Enable custom monster health?: true
Enable custom monster damage?: true
Enable Ender Dragons destroying blocks?: true
Enable Endermen picking blocks?: true
Enable custom monster explosion properties? (Normal Creeper/Ghast): true
Enable spawning changes?: true
Enable custom monster drops?: true
Enable monsters destroying nearby torches?: true
Enable monsters attacking from a massive range?: false
Minimum distance sprint with their custom speed: 5
Mega-aggro range: 160
Mega-aggro range Y: 80
Use daytime mega-aggro range?: false
Daytime Mega-aggro range: 160
Daytime Mega-aggro range Y: 80
Enable Zombies attacking walls?: true
Enable Zombie wall destruction sounds?: true
Enable Zombie wall hit sounds?: true
Enable PigZombies attacking walls?: true
Drop the block item when a Zombie destroys it?: true
Enable monsters nerdpoling? (Building straight up): true
Enable monsters airbridging? (Building across gaps): true
Kill the monster when it nerdpoles or airbridges?: true
Minimum frustration period before nerdpoling or airbridging: 10
Block to use for monsters building: stone
Make wolves aggressive?: false
Make zombie pigmen aggressive?: true
Make zombie pigmen use mega-aggro?: true
Check block spawn blacklist (deny spawn on these blocks)?: false
Invert block spawn list? (Make whitelist): false
Enable monster on hit potion effects?: false
Enable all other monster properties?: true
Bonus monsters per player: 6
Percent chance of spawning a monster in bonus waves: 100.0
Minimum light level to spawn: 0
Maximum light level to spawn: 7
Minimum bonus spawn distance: 20
Maximum bonus spawn distance: 50
Bonus spawn Y offset: 0
Bonus spawn period: 60000
Number of mobs to spawn in a spot if found: 4
Bonus distance max scale: 1.0
Naturalistic bonus spawn mob attempts per tick: 10
Tick period for bonus natural spawns, increase this to drastically slow spawning: 1
Minimum naturalistic bonus spawn distance: 24
Maximum naturalistic bonus spawn distance: 160
Minimum light level to spawn naturalistic bonus: 0
Maximum light level to spawn naturalistic bonus: 7
Minimum Y for naturalistic bonus: 0
Maximum Y for naturalistic bonus: 255
Naturalistic distance max scale: 1.0
Max natural distance from spawn before max spawns: 3000
Automatically remove mobs who spawn inside blocks?: true
Action RPG mode! Milliseconds required between damage, vanilla=500: 500
